movie.title: Mickey's Once Upon a Christmas
movie.description_intro: A Christmas themed, three-part anthology-style video. The first part, "Donald Duck: Stuck on Christmas", is essentially a retelling of Groundhog Day (1993), with Huey, Dewey, and Louie reliving Christmas ad infinitum. Next is "A Very Goofy Christmas", in which Goofy tries to overcome his son's skepticism about Santa Claus. Finally, "Mickey & Minnie's Gift Of The Magi" recreate the classic tale of ironic Christmas selflessness. The stories are linked together by narration by Kelsey Grammer.
movie.description_full: A Christmas themed, three-part anthology-style video. The first part, "Donald Duck: Stuck on Christmas", is essentially a retelling of Groundhog Day (1993), with Huey, Dewey, and Louie reliving Christmas ad infinitum. Next is "A Very Goofy Christmas", in which Goofy tries to overcome his son's skepticism about Santa Claus. Finally, "Mickey & Minnie's Gift Of The Magi" recreate the classic tale of ironic Christmas selflessness. The stories are linked together by narration by Kelsey Grammer.

movies.title: Infini-T Force the Movie: Farewell Gatchaman My Friend
movies.title_english: Infini-T Force the Movie: Farewell Gatchaman My Friend
movies.title_long: Infini-T Force the Movie: Farewell Gatchaman My Friend (2018)
movies.summary: Except for Condor Joe (who is from the alternate world) there NO other members of the Science Ninja Team in this movie. There are however three other Japanese superheroes who assist Ken the Eagle against the "Nexus" which threatens their home worlds.

movies.title: Idiots and Angels
movies.summary: Angel is a selfish, abusive, morally bankrupt man who hangs out as his local bar, berating the other patrons. One day, Angel mysteriously wakes up with a pair of wings on his back. The wings make him do good deeds, contrary to his nature. He desperately tries to rid himself of the good wings, but eventually finds himself fighting those who view the wings as their ticket to fame and fortune.

movies.title: Constantine: City of Demons - The Movie
movies.title_english: Constantine: City of Demons - The Movie
movies.title_long: Constantine: City of Demons - The Movie (2018)
movies.summary: A decade after a tragic mistake, Chas Chandler and occult investigator, John Constantine, set out to cure Chas's daughter, Trish, from a demonically induced coma. With the help of the mysterious Nightmare Nurse, the influential Queen of Angels, and the brutal Aztec God, Mictlantecuhtli, they just might have the chance to outsmart the demon Beroul and save Trish's soul.

movies.title: Toonstone
movies.summary: An inept gunslinger with an egotistical talking horse is recruited to save a town besieged by outlaws and evil aliens.
